Title: Gaffergate
Plot: Gil John pays a visit to the Watt brothers, Louis worries when an old college friend threatens to share stories, and Andy tries to talk his way out of "Gaffergate," only to learn he's got bigger image problems.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Alicia Sable, Brooke Bloom, Kobi Libii, Ben Rameaka, Amy Sedaris, Julie White, Haley Joel Osment, Richard Cox, Natalie Gold, Matthew Humphreys, Todd Susman, Lee Wilkof, Robert Stanton, Sofiya Akilov
